channel.title: Hugh Pennington on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Hugh Pennington on The Majority

item.title: ‘Five out of Ten’: Health experts slam Sturgeon’s COVID response
item.description: In a video interview, conducted for Scotland Matters, on how an independent Scotland would have dealt with the Coronavirus crisis, leading health experts have slammed Nicola Sturgeon and the Scottish Government, rating their efforts as only ‘five out of ten’. Due to constant TV exposure, the general public has a mostly positive view of Sturgeon’s handling of the crisis, and is favorably comparing Scotland’s perceived performance with that in England, despite similar infections and death rates.
